snippet: Runaway leaders Bayern Munich appeared to barely break sweat in a 4-0 win at Hanover 96 to chalk up their 14th Bundesliga win in a row on Sunday, leaving them a huge 19 points clear at the top....

headline.print_headline: Mueller Scores Twice as Bayern Win 14th in a Row
headline.main: Mueller Scores Twice as Bayern Win 14th in a Row

lead_paragraph: Runaway leaders Bayern Munich appeared to barely break sweat in a 4-0 win at Hanover 96 to chalk up their 14th Bundesliga win in a row on Sunday, leaving them a huge 19 points clear at the top.
